Question: Belkin International CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Belkin International

BoostCharge Pro 3-in-1 Magnetic Stand
- Leverages the new Qi2 standard for perfect alignment and reliable charging for Qi2-enabled devices at 15W
- Offers fast charging for Apple Watch Series 7 and later, and optimal charging for wireless earbuds
- Built with an adjustable hinge and made with a minimum 75% post-consumer recycled (PCR) materials
- Priced at $149.99 USD, available in March 2024

BoostCharge Pro Magnetic Power Bank
- Delivers up to 15W of power for Qi2-enabled devices on-the-go
- Engineered with an integrated kickstand and supports magnetic and MagSafe cases up to 3mm thick
- Offers power pass-through via USB-C port and is made with a minimum 72% PCR materials
- Available in 5K, 8K, and 10K options, priced at $59.99, $79.99, $99.99 USD, coming March 2024

BoostCharge Pro 4-Port USB-C GaN Charger 200W
- Packs 200W of power for fast charging up to 4 devices at the same time
- Engineered with GaN technology and Programmable Power Supply (PPS) for efficient power output and smart power allocation
- Compact and power-packed, made with a minimum 72% PCR materials
- Priced at $129.99 USD, coming March 2024

6-in-1 Core GaN Dock
- Features 1x HDMI port, 2x USB-A ports, 2x USB-C ports, and 1 gigabit ethernet port
- Approximately 50% smaller than other 6-in-1 solutions, made with a minimum 72% PCR materials
- Priced at $139.99 USD, available now on belkin.com

Built more responsibly
- Newly announced BoostCharge solutions are made with a minimum of 72% PCR materials and sold in plastic-free packaging
- Belkin remains committed to its goal of 100% carbon neutrality in its offices and operations by 2025
- Media kit is available for download

Source: businesswire.com
Summary_cn:
Belkin国际公司

BoostCharge Pro 3合1磁吸立架
- 利用最新的Qi2标准，为Qi2启用的设备提供15W的完美对齐和可靠充电
- 快速充电Apple Watch Series 7及更高版本，并为无线耳机提供最佳充电效果
- 具有可调节的铰链，由最少75％的回收再利用材料制成
- 售价为149.99美元，于2024年3月上市

BoostCharge Pro磁吸移动电源
- 提供最高15W的Qi2启用设备的移动充电
- 配备集成式支架，支持最多3mm厚的磁性和MagSafe手机壳
- 通过USB-C端口提供电力传递，由最少72％的回收再利用材料制成
- 提供5K、8K和10K选择，价格分别为59.99美元、79.99美元和99.99美元，于2024年3月上市

BoostCharge Pro 4端口USB-C GaN充电器 200W
- 提供最高200W的功率，可同时快速充电4台设备
- 采用GaN技术和可编程电源供应（PPS）以实现高效电力输出和智能电力分配
- 紧凑而功能强大，由最少72％的回收再利用材料制成
- 售价为129.99美元，于2024年3月上市

6合1 Core GaN Dock
- 包含1个HDMI端口、2个USB-A端口、2个USB-C端口和1个千兆以太网端口
- 大约比其他6合1方案小50％，由最少72％的回收再利用材料制成
- 售价为139.99美元，现已在belkin.com上有售

更负责任地构建
- 最新发布的BoostCharge解决方案采用最少72％的回收再利用材料制成，并采用免塑料包装销售
- Belkin公司致力于在2025年前实现其办公室和运营的100％碳中和目标
- 可下载媒体套件

来源：businesswire.com
